name: Soccer Manager
description: As a Soccer Manager, you control all aspects of your club. Every transfer, every tactic, every football match counts. Immerse yourself in the action as a football manager both on and off the pitch from planning training sessions, to building a world class stadium, controlling your club finances and discovering future superstars through an extensive scouting network and the dynamic transfer market.
